Median      Mean   3rd Qu.      Max.  #> -3.519694 -0.658831  0.009613 -0.002206  0.669598  3.905726 events <- fHMM_events(   list(dates = c("2001-09-11", "2008-09-15", "2020-01-27"),        labels = c("9/11 terrorist attack", "Bankruptcy Lehman Brothers", "First COVID-19 case Germany")) ) plot(model, plot_type = c("sdds","ts"), events = events) plot(model, plot_type = "pr")
